title: Metabolomics reveals the mechanism of persistent toxicity of AgNPs at environmentally relevant concentrations to Daphnia magna
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00350K, Paper
Qianqian Xiang, Qin Qin Li, Peng Wang, Hao-Cheng Yang, Zi-Hao Fu, Xiang Liang, Li Qiang Chen
Although the ecotoxicity of silver nanoparticles (AgNPs) has been of great concern, the persistence and underlying mechanisms of AgNPs toxicity remain understudied. This study explored the persistent mechanisms of AgNPs...
